titles.title: Mobile Mammography Promotion Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow refunds of Federal motor fuel excise taxes on fuels used in mobile mammography vehicles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Mobile Mammography Promotion Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the motor fuel excise tax fuel used in any highway vehicle designed exclusively to provide mobile mammography services.
